Cloud instance: New or updated In development (1) Rolling out (0) Launched (0) ID: 498159 Sort by Rollout Start: Newest to oldest Microsoft Teams: Chat Notes Microsoft Teams IN DEVELOPMENT ROLLOUT START September 2025 A new collaborative space is now available directly from your Teams chat, enabling real-time collaboration, organization of key information, and streamlined communications. Chat notes is available in 1:1 and group chat, and is accessible only to the chat members. Add images, format text, share Loop components, and mention chat members when you require their attention. Title: Global
Cloud instance: New or updated In development (1) Rolling out (0) Launched (0) ID: 499430 Sort by Rollout Start: Newest to oldest Microsoft Edge: Tab Groups – Auto-Save and Easy Revisit Microsoft Edge IN DEVELOPMENT ROLLOUT START September 2025 Microsoft Edge now automatically saves tab groups, making it easier than ever for users to pick up where they left off. Organized tab groups are preserved and ready to revisit anytime, whether a user is switching tasks or restarting the browser. Admins can control the availability of the feature using the “SyncTypesListDisabled” policy with the “openTabs” data type.
